segments.text: Room reservations . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , is there a room available ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of room do you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hold on , please . ... I'm afraid we're fully booked.The only room available at the moment is a suite .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . Thank you anyway .
segments.speaker: S2
